title: 1038 Start With Gratitude: A Simple Ritual That Will Change Your Life
description:
“When we appreciate everything that we already have, it puts us in a mindset of abundance!”

On Today's 5-minute Friday Lewis walks us through a simple ritual using the power of gratitude that will set you up for success!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1038

Podcasts that talk about gratitude:

Andrew Huberman: https://link.chtbl.com/1016-pod

Kelly McGonigal: https://link.chtbl.com/1006-pod

Dr. Ivan Joseph: https://link.chtbl.com/982-pod

Dr. Laurie Santos: https://link.chtbl.com/961-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
